Something about Myself

Hello! I am Massimo,I am very interested in how computers work, and how programs and internet are so useful. A couple of years ago i was wondering how to organize my days and remember my expenses, together with the tips, then i made a little program for the command line, learning java. With that on my desktop i just wanted to learn more and i looked intoto web-development. The biggest part of my last spare time is been used to try building application or websites, i like to learn new technologies and to build something with them.

MY CURRENT SKILLS:
  • All functionality int this page and in my portfolio is powerder by Javascript without any framework, out of the apps made with React.Othe functionality of some projects is made with AJAX or the new fetch-API to get data from other API.
  • HTML 5: is written with a knoledge about SEO, semantic markup to understand the code, and using the new features of the web.
  • About the Server Side i know a bit of PHP, and a bit of Server side Javascript with Node, but the most I've been dooing until now is about the front-end aspect of the web.
  • For the CSS design i use also Sass as preprocessor, and i try to meet the design type that is considered up-to-date, in some application I used Bootstrap.
  • Mobile Friendly: all the finished projects in my portfolio are fully responsive for different devices snd screens.


Portfolio

Projects in overview

My 3 main projects

React Application

Social Network

Social App with strong backend, using React, Redux, React-Router, and the backend with NODE connected to MongoDB. the layout is done with Bootstrap.The user can create a profile, share posts, leave likes and comments.I had a bit of trubbles building the backend, because of my backend-skills, and to make it work fine it was a bit tricky.

Navigation with custom Javascript

Portfolio

The projects that are already working are listed in my portfolio. The javascript functionality for the navigation between sections was the hardest part to build, i would like to open the project with a page transition feeling when clicking the title. I am now making it look better for small devices.

SASS & New Design

Lodge Renting

Is a modern looking webpage made with SASS, with new features, animations, and styles. The design of the project is built considering possible changes in the future, so the page is easy mantainable. In this webpage are put together many property to make it look at best as possible for the user.

Specific Of My Portfolio

Content and Ideas

The welcome text animations changes if opened from mobile devices, in the menu are some information and the link to my github repository. I am now making it responsive and linking the last projects. An idea was making the layout navigable throught the nav arrows in an horizontal spaace, to have an modern user interface that is interactive, fun, easy, and with the core informations. made with css js html5 the goal was to make it feel like a mobile app and not too empty for desktops or igger screens.
